actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to provide for the duty-free importation of loose glass prisms used in chandeliers and wall brackets.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to repeal the customs duty on loose glass prisms used in chandeliers and wall brackets.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to provide for the duty-free importation of loose glass prisms used in chandeliers and wall brackets.
